entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is mentioned as someone who gave advice to Cho on being a gentleman.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is the one who received advice from Wood and is smiling reminisently about it.

entities.name: pride of portree
entities.description: Pride of Portree is mentioned as a team that Wood might have been taken on by.

entities.name: puddlemere united
entities.description: Puddlemere United is the actual team that Wood was taken on by.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is talking to Cho and feeling confident and cheerful.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone that Harry talks to with ease.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also mentioned as someone that Harry talks to with ease.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is one of the Slytherin girls who passed by Harry and Cho.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as a house that Pansy Parkinson belongs to.

relationships.description: Wood advised Cho on being a gentleman.
